Uses of Package
yafgen

Classes in yafgen used by yafgen
FractalImage
          FractalImage represents the graphicsl representation of a fractal on the screen.
FractalIterationFunction
          FractalIterationFunction is the base class for fractals that represent a graphical image of iterations.
FractalParameters
          class FractalParameters stores all the values that are changed by the user interface and are important for the calculations
FractalRasterIteration
          FractalRasterIteration is the base class for fractals that can be represented by images on the complex plane.
SwingWorker
          This is the 3rd version of SwingWorker (also known as SwingWorker 3), an abstract class that you subclass to perform GUI-related work in a dedicated thread.
YaFGenMainFrame
          .Y.et .A.other .F.ractal .Gen.erator YAFG This Java application calculates and displays several fractals
